name: Craig Partridge
content: Directory Page – Department of Computer Science | CSU Craig Partridge Professor Office: Computer Science Building 440 Phone: (970) 491-6633 About My research focuses on data networking. Any problem that involves moving bits, bytes, packets, chunks, files, or another abstraction between two machines is of interest to me. Much of my recent work has been in wireless networks. As department chair, I am working to improve the diversity of our student body and to expand our industry partnerships.
